TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class PartitionedFileLoader : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataLoader, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PartitionedFileLoader extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataLoader, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ISchematized, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Model.ICanSaveModel
Public NotInheritable Class PartitionedFileLoader Implements IDataLoader, IDataView
type PartitionedFileLoader = class interface IDataLoader interface IDataView interface ISchematized interface ICanSaveModel

Docs.summary: Loads a set of directory partitioned files into an IDataView. The directories of the file will treated as column data and the underlying files are loaded using the data loader. The first file will be used as the basis for all follow-up file paths and schemas. Any files that don't match the expected path or schema will be skipped.
Docs.example:
Sample directory structure:
Data/ Year=2017/ Month=01/ data1.parquet data1.parquet Month=02/ data1.parquet data1.parquet Year=2018/ Month=01/ data1.parquet data1.parquet
